title: Inventory required access + secrets (Richpanel API key, Shopify access) and define secret storage plan
Verify Richpanel tenant automation capabilities needed for middleware trigger (deferred Wave 03 items)
Sample order linkage reality in tenant (Richpanel order endpoints) without storing PII
Finalize webhook authentication approach and rotation strategy (based on tenant verification)
Set up AWS Organization and create dev/staging/prod accounts (Organizations-only)
Create IAM roles and least-privilege policies for middleware (ingress vs worker) and CI deploy
Enable baseline logging + audit (CloudTrail, CloudWatch log retention, budgets, alarms)
Create Secrets Manager + SSM parameter namespaces for env config (including kill switch flags)
Select IaC tool and scaffold infrastructure repo modules (serverless stack)
Create CI pipeline with quality gates (unit tests, schema validation, lint, security checks)
Implement deployment promotion flow (dev → staging → prod) and rollback automation
Implement API Gateway + ingress Lambda (fast ACK, validation, enqueue)
Provision SQS FIFO + DLQ and internal message schema (conversation-ordered processing)
Create DynamoDB tables for idempotency + minimal conversation state with TTL
Implement worker Lambda skeleton (dequeue, fetch context, decision pipeline placeholder, action stub)
Implement runtime feature flags (safe_mode, automation_enabled, per-template toggles) with caching
Implement observability event logging + correlation IDs (ingress and worker)
Implement vendor retry/backoff utilities and concurrency bounds (prevent rate-limit storms)
Create Richpanel team + tags (Chargebacks/Disputes, mw-routing-applied, feedback tags) and document mapping
Configure Richpanel automation to trigger middleware on inbound customer messages (avoid loops)
Implement Richpanel API client with retries, pagination, and rate-limit handling
Implement action executor (route/tag/assign/reply) with action-level idempotency keys
Build integration test harness for Richpanel actions (staging recommended)
Implement deterministic order linkage lookup using Richpanel order endpoints
Map order details into template variables and handle common edge cases (multiple fulfillments)
Implement Shopify Admin API fallback (only if required and credentials exist)
Define and implement order-status-related routing rules (DNR, missing items, refund requests)
Implement classifier model call with strict schema validation (mw_decision_v1) and fail-closed fallback
Implement policy engine (Tier 0 overrides, Tier 2 eligibility, Tier 3 disabled) as authoritative layer
Implement Tier 2 verifier call (mw_tier2_verifier_v1) and integrate into policy gating
Implement confidence threshold configuration + calibration workflow hooks
Integrate offline eval harness into CI (golden set run + regression gates)
Implement template renderer (YAML templates + brand constants) with safe placeholder handling
Enforce template catalog: allowed template_ids, per-channel enablement, per-template feature flags
Implement Tier 1 safe-assist automation playbooks (DNR, missing items intake, refunds intake) + routing tags
Implement Tier 2 verified order status auto-reply (tracking link/number) with deterministic match + verifier approval
Enforce 'never auto-close' invariant across all automation paths
Create Richpanel 'AUTO:' macros aligned to template IDs (ops task) and document governance
Implement webhook authentication in ingress (header token preferred) + request schema validation
Implement PII redaction enforcement + tests (logs, traces, eval artifacts)
Deploy dashboards + alarms (Wave 06/07/08 alignment) and validate alert runbooks
Harden public endpoint (API Gateway throttling, optional WAF, SSRF/egress controls)
Implement secret rotation support (multi-token validation) + document operational steps
Operationalize IAM access reviews and break-glass workflow (alerts + cadence)
Implement and run smoke test pack in staging (routing + Tier1 + Tier2 + Tier0 + kill switch)
Run load/soak tests and validate backlog catch-up behavior without vendor storms
Execute first production deploy runbook (routing-only) and verify observability + rollback
Progressive enablement: enable Tier 1 templates first, then Tier 2 order status after verification
Establish post-launch governance cadence (weekly review, monthly calibration) and close the loop with agent feedback tags
